name: Dark Room (itch) (atumsk, Dukebot)
description:
I welcome you to my first game.

Dark Room is the story of a man that finds himself trapped in an unknown place. He wakes up in a dark room, not knowing how he got there.

The game is a text adventure game based on choices, it contains some puzzles and has 3 different endings, depending on the player's decisions.

CREDITS:

  • Dukebot: Programmer
    • https://dukebot.itch.io/
    • https://twitter.com/DukebotDev
  • atumsk: Designer/Writer
    • https://atumsk.itch.io/
    • https://twitter.com/atumsk
  • I got inspired by the Japanese elevator urban legend for the last section of the game.
